author: Kuro
description: Adds an attribute to redbot.core.commands.Context for sending message with components!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `DislashContext`!
This cog adds an attribute to `redbot.core.commands.Context` for sending message with components.
This can prevent dislash's monkeypatched `ctx.send` from conflicting with some cogs. (For example, `SlashTags`.)
name: DislashContext
short: Adds an attribute to redbot.core.commands.Context for sending message with components!
